ComicInfo.Title: Fury at the Factory; Origin of the Banshee; Enemy Agents Spread Terror and Ruin In the U.S.; Return of the Frog-Men; The Treachery of Prince Kafu; A Train Roars Through the Andes; Captive of the Fourth Dimension; Suicide Turns Murder
ComicInfo.Summary:
1. Fury At the Factory (13 pages) - Featuring Samson and David by Alex Blum
2. Origin of the Banshee (8 pages) - Featuring Banshee by Louis Cazeneuve
3. Murder Round-Up (2 pages) by Nathaniel Nitkin
4. Enemy Agents Spread Terror and Ruin In the U.S. (8 pages) - Featuring Black Fury by Dennis Neville
5. Return of the Frog-Men (7 pages) - Featuring Sub Saunders
6. The Treachery of Prince Kafu (5 pages) - Featuring Captain Kidd by Bill Bossert
7. A Train Roars Through the Andes (6 pages) - Featuring Yank Wilson
8. Captive of the Fourth Dimension (6 pages) - Featuring Flip Falcon by "Orville Wells"
9. Suicide Turns Murder (6 pages) - Featuring Space Smith by "Hank Christy"
